meanings: (글·글씨 등을) write, (시·편지 등을) compose, (적다) put[write] (sth) down, (간단히) jot sth down

meanings.meaning: the dark glasses he habitually wore

examples.korean: the dark glasses he habitually wore 발음듣기 그가 늘 쓰던 색안경 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the dark glasses he habitually wore 발음

examples.korean: He traded in his old car for a new Mercedes. 발음듣기 그는 자신이 쓰던 차를 주고 보상판매 형태로 메르세데스를 구입했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He traded in his old car for a new Mercedes. 발음

examples.korean: Just to give you an example of his generosity—he gave me his old car and wouldn’t take any money for it. 발음듣기 그냥 그의 너그러움을 보여주는 사례를 하나 든다면, 그는 나에게 자기가 쓰던 차를 주고는 돈을 전혀 받으려 하지 않았어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Just to give you an example of his generosity—he gave me his old car and wouldn’t take any money for it. 발음

examples.korean: I’m leaving my old toys here—if you don’t want them, just trash them. 발음듣기 여기 내가 쓰던 장난감들 두고 갈게. 네게 필요 없으면 그냥 버려. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’m leaving my old toys here—if you don’t want them, just trash them. 발음

examples.korean: I have organized the cleaning on a day-to-day basis, until our usual cleaner returns. 발음듣기 나는 우리가 늘 쓰던 청소부가 돌아올 때 까지는 청소를 그날그날 해결해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I have organized the cleaning on a day-to-day basis, until our usual cleaner returns. 발음
